identifier.name: IDTES Plugin for IBM UrbanCode Build

header.description: The IBM Development and Test Environment Services (IDTES) Automation Pack for UrbanCode Build provides steps for creating IDTES environments and templates, running, stopping and suspending IDTES environments, connecting networks and other useful operations in IDTES.

step-type.name: IDTES Authentication
step-type.description: Establish Authentication Credentials for Subsequent IDTES Operations

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: IDTES User ID.

property-ui.label: Authentication Key
property-ui.description: IDTES Authentication Key.

step-type.name: Create Environment from Template
step-type.description: Create an IDTES Environment from a IDTES Template

property-ui.label: Template ID
property-ui.description: The numerical Template ID to use to Create an IDTES Environment.

property-ui.label: Environment Name
property-ui.description: Optional new name for evironment

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: IDTES User ID.

property-ui.label: Authentication Key
property-ui.description: IDTES Authentication Key.

property-ui.label: Proxy Host
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Host to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

property-ui.label: Proxy Port
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Port to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

step-type.name: Change Environment State
step-type.description: Run, Suspend or Stop an IDTES Environment

property-ui.label: Environment ID
property-ui.description: The numerical Environment ID that you want to run, suspend or stop

property-ui.label: New Environment State
property-ui.description: The desired new run-state of the environment - possible values are Running, Suspended or Shutdown

property-ui.label: Power off Environment if Shutdown Fails
property-ui.description: Force halt if the the Environment fails to shutdown after 5 minutes

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: IDTES User ID.

property-ui.label: Authentication Key
property-ui.description: IDTES Authentication Key.

property-ui.label: Proxy Host
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Host to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

property-ui.label: Proxy Port
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Port to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

step-type.name: Change VM State
step-type.description: Run, Suspend or Stop an individual VM in an IDTES Environment

property-ui.label: Environment ID
property-ui.description: The numerical Environment ID that you want to run, suspend or stop

property-ui.label: VM Name or ID
property-ui.description: The name or numerical ID of the VM that you want to run, suspend or stop.

property-ui.label: New VM State
property-ui.description: The desired new run-state of the VM - possible values are Running, Suspended or Shutdown

property-ui.label: Power off VM if Shutdown Fails
property-ui.description: Force halt if the the VM fails to shutdown after 5 minutes

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: IDTES User ID.

property-ui.label: Authentication Key
property-ui.description: IDTES Authentication Key.

property-ui.label: Proxy Host
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Host to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

property-ui.label: Proxy Port
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Port to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

step-type.name: Get VM ID
step-type.description: Get the ID of the specified VM

property-ui.label: Environment ID
property-ui.description: The numerical Environment ID containing the VM for which you want to get the ID

property-ui.label: VM Name
property-ui.description: The Name of the Virtual Machine for which the you want to get the ID

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: IDTES User ID.

property-ui.label: Authentication Key
property-ui.description: IDTES Authentication Key.

property-ui.label: Proxy Host
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Host to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

property-ui.label: Proxy Port
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Port to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

step-type.name: Set VM User Data
step-type.description: Set the User Data (IDTES Metadata Service) in a VM in a Config to the specified string

property-ui.label: Environment ID
property-ui.description: The numerical Environment ID containing the VM for which the User Data is to be set

property-ui.label: VM Name
property-ui.description: The Name of the Virtual Machine for which the User Data is to be set

property-ui.label: User Data String
property-ui.description: The string to which the VM User Data is to be set

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: IDTES User ID.

property-ui.label: Authentication Key
property-ui.description: IDTES Authentication Key.

property-ui.label: Proxy Host
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Host to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

property-ui.label: Proxy Port
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Port to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

step-type.name: Connect to Network in another Environment (ICNR)

property-ui.label: Source Environment ID
property-ui.description: The Source numerical Environment ID for the ICNR connection

property-ui.label: Source Network Name
property-ui.description: The Name of the Source Network for the ICNR connection

property-ui.label: Target Environment ID
property-ui.description: The Target numerical Environment ID for the ICNR connection

property-ui.label: Target Network Name
property-ui.description: The Name of the Target Network for the ICNR connection

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: IDTES User ID.

property-ui.label: Authentication Key
property-ui.description: IDTES Authentication Key.

property-ui.label: Proxy Host
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Host to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

property-ui.label: Proxy Port
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Port to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

step-type.name: Connect to VPN Tunnel
step-type.description: Connect Environment Network to a VPN Tunnel

property-ui.label: Environment ID
property-ui.description: The numerical Environment ID of the IDTES environment which is to be connected to the VPN Tunnel

property-ui.label: Network Name
property-ui.description: The Name of the Network that is to be connected to the VPN tunnel

property-ui.label: VPN ID
property-ui.description: The ID of the VPN to which the environment is to be connected (e.g. vpn-12345)

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: IDTES User ID.

property-ui.label: Authentication Key
property-ui.description: IDTES Authentication Key.

property-ui.label: Proxy Host
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Host to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

property-ui.label: Proxy Port
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Port to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

step-type.name: Add Environment to Project
step-type.description: Add a Environment to a Project

property-ui.label: Environment ID
property-ui.description: The numerical Environment ID of the IDTES environment which is to be added to an IDTES Project

property-ui.label: Project Name
property-ui.description: The Name of the Project to which the Environment is to be added

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: IDTES User ID.

property-ui.label: Authentication Key
property-ui.description: IDTES Authentication Key.

property-ui.label: Proxy Host
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Host to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

property-ui.label: Proxy Port
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Port to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

step-type.name: Add Template to Project
step-type.description: Add a Template to a Project

property-ui.label: Template ID
property-ui.description: The numerical Template ID of the IDTES template which is to be added to an IDTES Project

property-ui.label: Project Name
property-ui.description: The Name of the Project to which the Template is to be added

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: IDTES User ID.

property-ui.label: Authentication Key
property-ui.description: IDTES Authentication Key.

property-ui.label: Proxy Host
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Host to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

property-ui.label: Proxy Port
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Port to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

step-type.name: Create Template from Environment
step-type.description: Create an IDTES Template from an IDTES Environment

property-ui.label: Environment ID
property-ui.description: The numerical Environment ID to use to Create a IDTES Template.

property-ui.label: Template Name
property-ui.description: Optional new name for template

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: IDTES User ID.

property-ui.label: Authentication Key
property-ui.description: IDTES Authentication Key.

property-ui.label: Proxy Host
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Host to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Port to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

step-type.name: Delete Environment

property-ui.label: Environment ID
property-ui.description: The numerical ID of the IDTES Environment to Delete.

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: IDTES User ID.

property-ui.label: Authentication Key
property-ui.description: IDTES Authentication Key.

property-ui.label: Proxy Host
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Host to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

property-ui.label: Proxy Port
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Port to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

step-type.name: Delete VM from Environment
step-type.description: Delete the specified VM from an IDTES Environment

property-ui.label: Environment ID
property-ui.description: The numerical ID of the IDTES Environment containing the VM that is to be Deleted.

property-ui.label: VM Name or ID
property-ui.description: The Name or numerical ID of the IDTES VM to delete from the specified environment.

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: IDTES User ID.

property-ui.label: Authentication Key
property-ui.description: IDTES Authentication Key.

property-ui.label: Proxy Host
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Host to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

property-ui.label: Proxy Port
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Port to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

step-type.name: Add Template to Environment
step-type.description: Add the contents of an IDTES template to an IDTES environment

property-ui.label: Template ID
property-ui.description: The numerical Template ID of the IDTES template that is to be added to the contents of the environment

property-ui.label: Environment ID
property-ui.description: The numerical Environment ID of the IDTES environment to which the contents of the template is to be added

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: IDTES User ID.

property-ui.label: Authentication Key
property-ui.description: IDTES Authentication Key.

property-ui.label: Proxy Host
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Host to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

property-ui.label: Proxy Port
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Port to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

step-type.name: Add VM from Template to Environment
step-type.description: Add the specified VM from an IDTES template to an IDTES environment

property-ui.label: Template ID
property-ui.description: The numerical Template ID of the IDTES template that is to be added to the contents of the environment

property-ui.label: VM name or ID
property-ui.description: The name or numerical ID of the VM contained in the specified template that is to be added to the contents of the environment

property-ui.label: New VM Name
property-ui.description: A new name to assign to the VM after it has been added to the specified environment. If no name is specified, the name will remain as it was in the source Template

property-ui.label: Environment ID
property-ui.description: The numerical Environment ID of the IDTES environment to which the contents of the template is to be added

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: IDTES User ID.

property-ui.label: Authentication Key
property-ui.description: IDTES Authentication Key.

property-ui.label: Proxy Host
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Host to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

property-ui.label: Proxy Port
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Port to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

step-type.name: List Published URL for Environment
step-type.description: List the Named Desktops Published URL for the Specified Environment

property-ui.label: Environment ID
property-ui.description: The numerical Environment ID of the IDTES environment that contains the named Desktops Published URL

property-ui.label: Published URL Name
property-ui.description: The Name of the Published URL

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: IDTES User ID.

property-ui.label: Authentication Key
property-ui.description: IDTES Authentication Key.

property-ui.label: Proxy Host
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Host to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

property-ui.label: Proxy Port
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Port to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

step-type.name: Create Published URL for Environment
step-type.description: Create a Named Desktops Published URL for the Specified Environment

property-ui.label: Environment ID
property-ui.description: The numerical Environment ID of the IDTES environment that contains the named Desktops Published URL

property-ui.label: Published URL Name
property-ui.description: The Name of the Published URL

property-ui.label: Published URL Permissions
property-ui.description: The Permitted Use for the Published URL

property-ui.label: Published URL Password
property-ui.description: The Optional Password for the Published URL

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: IDTES User ID.

property-ui.label: Authentication Key
property-ui.description: IDTES Authentication Key.

property-ui.label: Proxy Host
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Host to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

property-ui.label: Proxy Port
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Port to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

step-type.name: Create Published Service for VM
step-type.description: Create a Published Service for the Specified VM

property-ui.label: Environment ID
property-ui.description: The numerical Environment ID of the IDTES environment that contains the named Desktops Published URL

property-ui.label: VM Name
property-ui.description: The Name of the VM in the IDTES environment for which the Published Service is to be created

property-ui.label: Network Name
property-ui.description: The Name of the Network in the Specified VM that is to be associated with the Published Service

property-ui.label: Port Number
property-ui.description: The Port that is to be assocated with the Published Service

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: IDTES User ID.

property-ui.label: Authentication Key
property-ui.description: IDTES Authentication Key.

property-ui.label: Proxy Host
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Host to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

property-ui.label: Proxy Port
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Port to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

step-type.name: List Published Service for VM
step-type.description: List a Published Service for the Specified VM

property-ui.label: Environment ID
property-ui.description: The numerical Environment ID of the IDTES environment that contains the VM for which to get the Published Service

property-ui.label: VM Name
property-ui.description: The Name of the VM in the IDTES environment for which the Published Service is to be listed

property-ui.label: Network Name
property-ui.description: The Name of the Network in the Specified VM that is associated with the Published Service

property-ui.label: Port Number
property-ui.description: The Port that is assocated with the Published Service

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: IDTES User ID.

property-ui.label: Authentication Key
property-ui.description: IDTES Authentication Key.

property-ui.label: Proxy Host
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Host to Connect to cloud.skytap.com

property-ui.label: Proxy Port
property-ui.description: IDTES Proxy Port to Connect to cloud.skytap.com
